title: (x) 1970s looking Great Western Modern folk dance group poster - Friz Quadrata {Jan E}
content:
Hi. I'm looking to identify this font, used on a 1970's (maybe 1980's?) poster to advertise a folk dance group in the UK. Does anyone know what it is?  
Many thanks,  
Graham
